    • Field Detail

      • modelAccess

        private static final java.lang.String[] modelAccess
        Possible access when performing an operation. `proxy` refers to an intermediate entity which is able to perform the operation; `self` refers to the ability to perform the operation by itself;

      • NAME

    • Method Detail

      • operationToJSON

        public static org.json.simple.JSONObject operationToJSON​(java.lang.String name,
                                                         java.lang.String proxy,
                                                         java.lang.String value,
                                                         java.lang.String param)
        Create a JSON object which represents an operation that certain entity is able to perform.
        Parameters:
        name - - name of operation
        proxy - - proxy entity as a way to perform the operation
        value - - value for given operation
        param - - parameter as entity on which the operation is performed
        Returns:
        - json object encapsulating all operation details

      • registrationToJSON

        public static org.json.simple.JSONObject registrationToJSON​(java.lang.String node,
                                                            java.lang.String category,
                                                            java.lang.String name,
                                                            org.json.simple.JSONArray operations)
        Create a JSON object which encapsulates necessary details to register an entity.
        Parameters:
        node - - the node in the context of which is located
        category - - category of entity. e.g. support, agent, node etc
        name - - the name of the entity
        operations - - all operations this entity is able to perform
        Returns:
        - json object encapsulating all details
